text: Cormack Field House or "The Pit" is the track and field facility for the Virginia Military Institute (VMI) Keydets, located in Lexington, Virginia. It was VMI's home for basketball until 1981, when Cameron Hall was completed as the new VMI basketball arena. Cormack Field House is named after Walt Cormack, a VMI track coach for twenty-five years and who also started the "Winter Relays". == References == * Cormac Field House Website Category:VMI Keydets basketball Category:College indoor track and field venues in the United States Category:Indoor track and field venues in the United States Category:Defunct college basketball venues in the United States Category:1930s establishments in Virginia Category:Basketball venues in Virginia Category:Athletics (track and field) venues in Virginia
title: Cormack Field House
